Description: Fires > 40 ha. Filtered to include fires from the preceding 30 years (i.e., 1980-2010  for comparison to the original model and 1990-2020 for the ring of fire projections)

Data set: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry Annual report
Description: Includes all harvest from 1990 to 2018 although 1990- 2002 is less exact estimated harvest. Data was not available before 1990, 1990-2010 was used for comparison to the original model and 1990-2020 for the ring of fire projections
Copyright Concerns: Not clear whether we can distribute this data

Data set: MNRF road segments and Ontario road network
Description: Roads in both datasets that did not fully overlap were combined by removing roads from the Ontario road network that were within 100 m of a road in the MNRF data. Roads present in 2010 were approximated based on roads that had a year of construction in the MNRF data before 2010 or had no year of construction
All railways were assumed to be have been present in 2010
Utility lines present in 2010 were approximated by filtering the data by the “business effective date”

Variable: DEC, CON, MIX, LGW, ST, LGTP, LGOP, LGMD
Description: Landsat derived land cover data with 27 classes
Used to reflect anthropogenic disturbance in the Roads and Mines scenario
Copyright Concerns: Not clear whether we can distribute this data

Description: Combined with existing roads for the Roads Only scenario
Copyright Concerns: Not clear whether we can distribute this data

Description: Used to clip data to Missisa range boundary

Data set: Missisa model output from Hornseth and Rempel
Description: Output by the original model authors used to validate our reproduction of the model
Copyright Concerns: Not clear whether we can distribute this data

Description: Used for mapping study area. FMUs were unioned to get the outline of the AOU
